title: Dissasociative Identity Disorder (DID)
author: Vector Team
description: What is DID? How is it unique? What patients experience when they suffer from DID? Is it dangerous?

title: Anorexia Nervosa
author: Vector Team
description: We heard it all the time. Only models would have it? Is it only stomachache? What makes it a mental disorder?

title: Major Depressive Disorder
author: Vector Team
description: Most stigmatized mental disorder. Sadness? Blue period of life? What differentiate between mental disorder and normal depressive phases in life?

title: Bipolar Disorder and Bipolar Spectrum
author: Vector Team
description: What does 'bipolar' mean? What are features of people with bipolar? Why are certain people more susceptible to the disease comparing with others? Do you know how many famous people are affected by the disease? What is a bipolar spectrum?

title: Hyperthyroidism
author: Zihan Jin
description: Where is your thyroid gland? What are the symptoms of people with hyperthyroidism? Learn more about the disease and pathogenesis of it.

title: Migraine with Aura
author: Vector Team
description: Headache? With snowflakes sparkles blocking your vision? Panicking about becoming blind? It's alright! You're not alone. Come and learn about Migraine with Aura!

title: Face Blindness (Prosopagnosia)
author: Vector Team
description: Visual problem? Blind? A joke that people talk about? What exactly is face blindness? What kind of disorder is face blindness? Don't worry, let's talk about the myth from the eyes of a scientist!

title: Scleroderma
author: Vector Team
description: I got a cut from a sword. A sword I might be born with.
